elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Look up the following terms and make a note of their meaning.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Nationalistic:
elements.correctAnswer: Someone who is nationalistic loves their homeland or their fatherland.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Tags:
elements.correctAnswer: In graffiti language, a tag is the name of the sprayer (usually a pseudonym is chosen).

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Epicenter:
elements.correctAnswer: The epicenter is basically the point on the earth's surface that is exactly above the source of an earthquake. In the context of the texts, this means that New York was the place from which graffiti art became famous.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Publication:
elements.correctAnswer: A publication is the release of a work.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Popular:
elements.correctAnswer: Popular is something that is known to the masses.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Art historical:
elements.correctAnswer: Art history is the history of the development and epochs of the visual arts.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Boom:
elements.correctAnswer: Something that experiences a boom blossoms and spreads.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Commercialization:
elements.correctAnswer: Certain things (such as graffiti art) are increasingly being turned into a business.
